# 如何从 kubeconfig 文件解析出凭证

> 参考：https://blog.csdn.net/yanghuadong_1992/article/details/113794778

kubeconfig 文件位置 `~/.kube/config`

文件内容为如下格式：

```shell
apiVersion: v1
clusters:

- cluster:
  certificate-authority-data: 
  server: https://kubernetes.docker.internal:6443
  name: docker-desktop
  contexts:
- context:
  cluster: docker-desktop
  user: docker-desktop
  name: docker-desktop
  current-context: docker-desktop
  kind: Config
  preferences: {}
  users:
- name: docker-desktop
  user:
    client-certificate-data: 
    client-key-data: 
```

我们在 k8s 主机驱动中需要以下几个数据：

* URL：server 地址
* CA：解析 client-certificate-data: 
* token

用户可选择上传 kubeconfig 文件，我们解析上传的文件，拿到这三个值。

内容为如下：

```shell
URL：https://172.16.1.121:6443
CA：
-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----
```

## 利用 base64 解析出证书

* 可选择在线网站或者 linux 命令解析

  > echo $certificate-authority-data | base64 -D

  ```shell
  -----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----
  MIIEpAIBAAKCAQEAyriZPAWdZv75CsijtdYlVHUTxiYU1Yuxm7/f7IzDS8iAenSy
  GtxLj1znkIBHgDApQmu4rhQZmPIJwjbJY37WMZj9AFZNSJ0+H+wA0F5REnD5DAeY
  Jw5jzL3lvXnmnbM3oxpsUJUrwn9qnO6cqRt4nJbF0VqpC1u9khE63I9AZlSq9Wkm
  0E4B7/sEJxYZZVvvcSz35PbZBYUu8cStK3Bxns5gg7Y+BTBCAXIlJKn1Jwr2tQMS
  a0h90PFeFXpX0VTgOykRo268a4XImSWlXBiwFnas/HhUJRjh168caW3F3dzwHxoG
  ANO8RpEVCPiVIksjs891S/6zZGKW8m5ZarzegwIDAQABAoIBADO0D0kSuYmKYGRS
  tgZrnsvCrI9uKQQqA9uQfYEsiabrdXFGECLvqsnezSS6wwG7xtos9UZY1AqBOOHy
  7TxWHjU6KtUKLd3mVPD5VV/PnmfQroRV74WOkv+mM1E3JQ11pywPUi7fTPDnZH6w
  EP7EheeSQNPbhp/h/yChCl00oB046MBUCw2HNexgaiJxtyYeCibkOoByDjp6mjSp
  wj5U0PaY5hC0smhJs1yW0YQDOGSCgzsR8RssmLYl4QAzsJzD1llG1Z/16kaBIivq
  XFfroQCM2ozSu/zzJgPT9de0OcjR49iNhxP8T70GQfZYep6hFiYApsSQmAPjld1U
  o0HcUfkCgYEA6VqidmYQ9VaffYa51VRBAjPigxV6tLotrk9UbraR0i2UGFkGXYXd
  lCQg9h3IpEQ8g4iWdJxtDF70qDZE9FrhYWOr8m+Dap2x8XscVQ7+oNykEMV2ccc2
  r2RKvcluR3VmAl65otCFrWJH/Zy3Mpo/E5TF+souPqW9hEmF3Drr3i0CgYEA3mTt
  /5Z7LXj9kn+GrlQzKss27EMAeTIatFX7zQ79S6ELh1GnTGlEUYmpH8pbY+l8SSdp
  13RBN4p7qLbu7KMuW/N7m24/fYn1N8nefMINUW6xvc6Q53DnSEqHzLQHnm6oND4J
  AJwXDH9TQuEXXAVJgzOAcC5ap61MYlUve6m0TW8CgYEAySifai88KTH+FOiB49tY
  mvx9JADtIURpQp0SLMpnU+aEhqSfrxlJ1H18iI1OPASyobSp9mYuPv7QKv11XavG
  I/0W6culXtAH6CH3X3+okqUBLY/7NcPEaVescoRk82bJg/uCTU8yHS/e3UouRonf
  HBMgw7tsOAcKIzJ6GUoVsBUCgYAnYkxblPSfauvNA9SADt042OATGxJ8ZAkioo+D
  EwJ8YDrAbg9oksPMhMp0nMtueCzQb7BovWfHRDj9+dd6BLPzCL19GxsXSlUo2hES
  mvLs1uOXL3ut4Oq0fK5r6/3lasdS6SGDACF8zxeZom8WlsEcAQTf2PWo+CGs0FUm
  WzlY9QKBgQDKUBy1nOEPMXbp8kCiYnoN63c/3Cl2P4ITw+iLzeEuVC/HHl1LibGI
  kf8vVWPH8wYwEXn9EqnR9FvaAMc+LEwUdZFnk8PTg1L0s5IRCPPD67IBUjhl2HIU
  k83lCvlQ4DO+3czEuiClH3CF7Xtty10hQQhKeqwz+vIVNrrPlBSPZg==
  -----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----
  ```

  > ！！！这个得到的只是一个 rsa 私钥，还不能称为证书！！！
  >
  > 带有 `BEGIN CERTIFICATE`字样的才能称为证书！！！

* 转换成 pem 证书

  > `openssl x509 -in credential.crt -out credential.pem`

* 查看 pem 内容

  > 安装工具
  >
  > https://github.com/cloudflare/cfssl/releases
  >
  > cfssl-certinfo -cert credential.pem
  
  ```shell
  $ cfssl-certinfo -cert credential.pem
  {
    "subject": {
      "common_name": "docker-for-desktop",
      "organization": "system:masters",
      "names": [
        "system:masters",
        "docker-for-desktop"
      ]
    },
    "issuer": {
      "common_name": "kubernetes",
      "names": [
        "kubernetes"
      ]
    },
    "serial_number": "6463482104477627993",
    "not_before": "2021-07-27T09:31:33Z",
    "not_after": "2022-09-04T14:09:38Z",
    "sigalg": "SHA256WithRSA",
    "authority_key_id": "D4:72:41:FF:AB:48:33:34:D8:64:B6:74:EC:A2:65:17:4C:F6:34:D6",
    "subject_key_id": "",
    "pem": "-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----\nMIIDIzCCAgugAwIBAgIIWbLmuqF7tlkwDQYJKoZIhvcNAQELBQAwFTETMBEGA1UE\nAxMKa3ViZXJuZXRlczAeFw0yMTA3MjcwOTMxMzNaFw0yMjA5MDQxNDA5MzhaMDYx\nFzAVBgNVBAoTDnN5c3RlbTptYXN0ZXJzMRswGQYDVQQDExJkb2NrZXItZm9yLWRl\nc2t0b3AwggEiMA0GCSqGSIb3DQEBAQUAA4IBDwAwggEKAoIBAQDKuJk8BZ1m/vkK\nyKO11iVUdRPGJhTVi7Gbv9/sjMNLyIB6dLIa3EuPXOeQgEeAMClCa7iuFBmY8gnC\nNsljftYxmP0AVk1InT4f7ADQXlEScPkMB5gnDmPMveW9eeadszejGmxQlSvCf2qc\n7pypG3iclsXRWqkLW72SETrcj0BmVKr1aSbQTgHv+wQnFhllW+9xLPfk9tkFhS7x\nxK0rcHGezmCDtj4FMEIBciUkqfUnCva1AxJrSH3Q8V4VelfRVOA7KRGjbrxrhciZ\nJaVcGLAWdqz8eFQlGOHXrxxpbcXd3PAfGgYA07xGkRUI+JUiSyOzz3VL/rNkYpby\nbllqvN6DAgMBAAGjVjBUMA4GA1UdDwEB/wQEAwIFoDATBgNVHSUEDDAKBggrBgEF\nBQcDAjAMBgNVHRMBAf8EAjAAMB8GA1UdIwQYMBaAFNRyQf+rSDM02GS2dOyiZRdM\n9jTWMA0GCSqGSIb3DQEBCwUAA4IBAQAtFD6mHbLA6eqtV9uy3jdnDYJTjAE+fyL/\n0lcUD8hTNG2y//Sv3yvHHlLbhWWUQi+uvmbapclo843vDEo4Cb3l3bbhcNnm38sO\nYvdlNDp+UC6JBiVXk10E8X1Aqwdp8OPQamzzxBnbdTAOSva16v4QCFUOhOuBKYcv\ngnrdRv8FIBkNG375tVPEgCPkugor9PbnvkkGjXAl/pBczNwKHu726ASPygGvdbL7\nMR4JJz7LMvWPZlrplf757rkCzzCB7mBf8TLDwtXNJkT4Leoxq3T4hUzIC39XCQVj\nyvFjxaoISj0u5XJisapK52d2UDgqT/Okb0xeabW+2AYrbvxWg1Js\n-----END CERTIFICATE-----\n"
  }
  ```

## token

default namespace

`kubectl -n kube-system describe secret default| awk '$1=="token:"{print $2}'`

```shell
eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6InFFaUpqNXlHaUlzSy1VdVhMMnBWYU1rTzBld3p6c01la0ZPSnJ3dDRxLTAifQ..N8w3eJ49TZO0rhcf8sU6yZTuumXTsT0E6-glZerzvPDT7b4eQS5BxS043OMWJcVSruTUPvK7IQ5Qwh3F3uAkWHIhIIYqyp3dMlzlpRnvMOi23G2Iw1nTopEJfpxPgIS9cAyXjeuEfscJpSmramZUuEj0doZFU3UiCkE0-zduPYUS1cprpMz56SZoABTC9HvTH-PSsq3ZpuKVHPgymFA-7gPwbZZ-v_8VWJGCdZcQ3vUDr6PwMC3QYCp342TQl1ev5y6jvXgEssv1YE6De3kD_BFUCLFTykl9QNeS-bTyC7kCfPBZOd-wYwekIdc4tILU7ZAJDPr_l9b3NCU3odRwKg
```
## 重启集群

重启集群后，需重复上述过程！！！
